segments.text: Where are you studying and what's your major ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am studying at Beijing University . I major in Civil Law .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why did you choose Beijing University ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because Beijing University is the best university in China and I'm sure I am one of the best students .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have learned many courses , such as Civil Law , Economic Law , Commercial Law and Administration Law .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which one is your favorite ? Why ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Civil Law . Because it is broad and profound , and furthermore , it best reflects the spirits of fairness and equality .
segments.speaker: S2
